professional_summary: Experienced Cloud Engineer with expertise in AWS, Terraform, Chef, and Puppet. Proficient in infrastructure automation, CI/CD pipelines, and database administration.

key_responsibilities: Managed infrastructure for applications in AWS using Terraform and automation tools.
Built and automated CI/CD pipelines for various applications.
Provided guidelines for deployment and troubleshooting build system failures.
Monitored and supported database systems using Oracle 10g Grid Control and SQL*Plus.
Designed database tables as per technical specifications.
Implemented automated backup strategies using UNIX shell scripts.

work_experience.company: Oracle Database Administrator - Virginia Beach, VA
key_responsibilities: Monitored database systems and provided technical support for database issues.
Designed database tables and translated business requirements into database objects.
Implemented automated backup strategies using RMAN.
